message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
I understand that $120 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $95 for the product.
I'm getting close to your price, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $105 is still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $98 for the product.
I'm trying to find a sweet spot, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $102.50. It's a fair price for a unique product like this.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $97.50 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $100. It's the lowest I can go. Take it or leave it.
I understand you're not willing to go any lower, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $95 for the product, and that's my final offer.
